What, you don't think that I couldn't beat you with a handicap? Fine! Whatever!
T-there are no Americans around, right? A couple of ships might not be-- oh, but I definitely am! There's no treaty on destroyers, anyway.
But, uh, if you really want to know, my maintenance crew is the type to do that. So that's, like, 11. That's not even counting the base crew!
Although I'd really prefer to avoid all the exploding...

T-that sounds kind of... not good! Don't do that! Being able to move is kinda important, okay!?

I'll show them who's "slow"! I'll have this game over in a flash!

A-are you even listening to me? I'm not overweight at all! Hey!

It's fine, only my rigging burned up! I can still play.

Ahaha, I can't really help it.

Yeah, the Japanese destroyer! That's me!

Shipgirl armor is pretty sturdy!
Magic? Mmm, Akashi says that we don't work via magic, it's te... tehk... tehknowlogee?
O-oh, I see, ehehe...
Huh? I guess you aren't super familiar with warships, so it's okay that you don't know - this is my hull plating, Marinette!
Destroyer armor isn't designed for protection! I've been built for speed!
It's, uh, what did Akashi say... like a safety mechanism... kinda?
Akashi says that it's... my boat instinct? I dunno how it works.
Ehehe, the budget was pretty tight at the time... iron was kind of hard to get a hold of...
Well, my armor was designed for speed after all, not for protection.
Yeah, well, destroyer armor isn't known for its coverage, Ochako!
Of course it's underwear. Internal amour is pretty important, you know?
Ohh, Marinette! You learn pretty quickly! Wow!
Well, of course I'm not wearing battleship armor! I'm not built for gunfights like they are!
Mm, yeah! Misato, you can't let a couple losses ruin the game!
Palutena! I already told you that I'm a destroyer, not a battleship! My armor's designed for speed!
Eh, really? I feel super light and everything, so I'd say they did a good job.
They work alongside my radar systems, so they're pretty sensitive to vibrations, yeah.
Well, without all that extra tonnage, I can move a lot quicker, ehehe.
Giving it your all until the very end is the IJN's code of honor, Mia! If I can still move, I can still play!
I was taught to fight until the very end, Mia! If I can still move, I can still play!
Of course, Miko! If there's anything I'm proud of, it's my speed!
You're right, Pit! I can't lose here!
Of course I've tested my components! I've been in active service for a long time now, 9S!
H-hey! I have plenty of things to be proud about, like my speed! That's all I need!
It's entirely natural, Marinette! I am made of steel, after all!
My maintenance crews do a good job at keeping me in working order, Marinette!
I wasn't the captain the first time around, but this time I am! I have a responsibility for my fairy crew!
What? No? Misato, you said it yourself. They're just parts!
Ehehe, thanks, I guess?
Optional? No way! You can fit all sorts of things in there! Provisions! Munitions! Spare parts!

state.text: I won't need any repairs for a while. Let's keep going.
